plain: 12 Monkeys, Braveheart, The Shawshank Redemption, Primal Fear, To Gillian on Her 37th Birthday, 12 Angry Men, Good Will Hunting, Rain Man, Saving Private Ryan, The Matrix, Ghostbusters, The Sixth Sense, American Beauty, and Toy Story 2 are all movies that the user enjoys.
